data.name: AnalogBatteryChecking
data.value: Please make sure you have charged your battery to 25%. You may not continue until you have done so.

data.name: AnalogRecoveryDisclaimerFirst
data.value: Recovering your HoloLens will erase all of your content, including apps, games, pictures, music, and videos, and will restore the factory settings.

data.name: AnalogRecoveryDisclaimerSecond
data.value: Once you start, you won’t be able to cancel or go back.

data.name: AnalogRecoveryDisclaimerThird
data.value: Recovering your device can take up to 30 minutes, and you’ll need to keep it plugged in until it’s finished. It’s best not to use your PC during recovery.

data.name: AnalogRecoverySubheader
data.value: Since your HoloLens wasn’t automatically detected, you’ll need to put it into recovery mode with the following steps.

data.name: AnotherInstanceAlreadyRunning
data.value: Another instance of {0} is already running.

data.name: AutomaticPackageFileSelection
data.value: Searching correct package for connected device.

data.name: AvailablePackageIsOlder
data.value: Available software is older than that on your device.

data.name: AwaitRecoveryAfterEmergencyFlashingInstruction
data.value: Waiting for device after succesfull recovery operation. If battery is low it may take up to 30 minutes.

data.name: BatteryWarning
data.value: Make sure that your battery level is at least 25%. Otherwise it may damage your device.

data.name: ButtonMyPhoneIsNotOnTheList
data.value: My device is not on the list

data.name: CheckIfPhoneIsDetectedAsQHUSB_DLOAD
data.value: Check if the device is detected as USB device QHUSB_DLOAD

data.name: CleanUserDataQuestion
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete all application data (reports, device software packages, log files)?

data.name: ComputerBatteryWarning
data.value: The battery on your computer is running low. Please connect your computer to a charger and try again.

data.name: ConnectPhoneWithUsbCable
data.value: Connect USB cable to the device.

data.name: ConnectedDeviceCannotBeRecovered
data.value: The connected device cannot be recovered.

data.name: DeleteLogsQuestion
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete log files?

data.name: DeletePackagesQuestion
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete software recovery files?

data.name: DeleteReportsQuestion
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete report files?

data.name: DirectoryNotSet
data.value: Directory not selected or does not exist.

data.name: DisclaimerBackupInfo
data.value: Personal content on the device will be erased during the installation. We recommend that you create a backup on your device, under:

data.name: DisclaimerInfoInstallationDuration
data.value: Installing the software should take about 15 minutes. The download time of the software package depends on network speed.

data.name: DisconnectPhone
data.value: Disconnect USB cable from the device.

data.name: DowngradeSoftwareQuestion
data.value: You are trying to install software that is older than installed on your device. Do you want to continue?

data.name: DownloadingCancelMessage
data.value: This will cancel the download. Already downloaded files will not be deleted. You may resume download later.

data.name: ErrorDescription_AutoUpdateException
data.value: There seems to be a problem connecting to the server. Check your Internet connection. Make sure that your proxy, firewall, and virus protection settings are correct. Please also check your time and date settings.

data.name: ErrorDescription_CannotAccessDirectoryException
data.value: It seems that you do not have the necessary permission for the directory. Please change the directory path or change the directory permissions.

data.name: ErrorDescription_DownloadPackageException
data.value: Please check if proxy settings are correct and click "{0}". If you want to cancel downloading process please click "{1}".

data.name: ErrorDescription_EmergencyPackageNotFoundOnServerException
data.value: Emergency flashing for your device is currently not supported

data.name: ErrorDescription_FirmwareFileNotFoundException
data.value: Software package is incomplete. One or more files are missing. Download package again or select other software.

data.name: ErrorDescription_HtcUsbCommunicationException
data.value: Restart device to {0}. Check device USB connection.

data.name: ErrorDescription_HtcUsbPortOpenException
data.value: Check if other application occupies port. Check device USB connection.

data.name: ErrorDescription_NoInternetConnectionException
data.value: The latest operation could not be completed because the Internet connection is not active.

data.name: ErrorDescription_NotEnoughSpaceException
data.value: We need at least {0} of additional free space on the {1} drive.

data.name: ErrorDescription_PackageNotFoundException
data.value: Software package not available for this device.

data.name: ErrorDescription_PlannedServiceBreakException
data.value: The service is unavailable between {0} and {1}. Please try again later.

data.name: ErrorDescription_ReadPhoneInformationException
data.value: We could not read information from your device.

data.name: ErrorDescription_RestartApplicationException
data.value: Please disconnect all devices and restart application. If the problem persists, uninstall {0} and download the latest version of the application.

data.name: ErrorDescription_UnknownError
data.value: The operation could not be completed.

data.name: ErrorDescription_WebException
data.value: There seems to be a problem connecting to the server. Check your Internet connection. Make sure that your proxy, firewall, and virus protection settings are correct.

data.name: ErrorDetails_NotEnoughSpaceOnTheDiskException
data.value: Minimum amount of free space on disk {0} required for update is {1}. Free some space and try again.

data.name: ErrorHeader
data.value: Sorry, we ran into a problem

data.name: Error_DeviceNotFoundException
data.value: The device could not be found

data.name: Error_DownloadPackageException
data.value: There was a problem while downloading the software package

data.name: Error_FileNotFoundException
data.value: File or path: "{0}" was not found

data.name: Error_NotEnoughSpaceException
data.value: Not enough space on the disk

data.name: Error_NotEnoughSpaceOnTheDiskException
data.value: Not enough space on the disk

data.name: Error_SoftwareInstallationFailed
data.value: Software installation failed. Please try restarting your device, and try the software installation again. If your device is not detected please use button "{0}" on Welcome screen.

data.name: Error_SoftwareInstallationFailed_ReconnectUSB
data.value: Software installation failed. Please check the USB cable connected to the device and try the software installation again after disconnecting-reconnecting the USB cable.

data.name: Error_SoftwareIsNotCorrectlySignedException
data.value: The software is not correctly signed or not signed for this device.

data.name: Error_WebException
data.value: Could not connect to the server

data.name: FawkesRecoveryManual_Step1
data.value: Press and hold down the click button

data.name: FawkesRecoveryManual_Step2
data.value: Simultaneously press and hold down the pairing button using a stylus (or pen)

data.name: FawkesRecoveryManual_Step3
data.value: Keep holding both the buttons together for 15 seconds for device to reset

data.name: FawkesRecoverySubheader
data.value: Since your Clicker was not automatically detected, you will need to reset it with the following steps:

data.name: FirmwareIntegrityError
data.value: Software package {0} is corrupted. Download package again or select other software.

data.name: FlashCancelMessage
data.value: Software package installation is in progress. Cancelling may damage your device. Are you sure you want to cancel the action?

data.name: FlashWarningMessage1
data.value: Do not use your device. Do not disconnect the cable. Do not switch off the device. Otherwise your device may stop working.

data.name: FlashWarningMessage2
data.value: During the installation, your device restarts and the screen goes blank. You can ignore all Windows notifications about USB cable connection.

data.name: FlashWarningMessage_Fawkes
data.value: During the installation, your device restarts and the led will blink. You can ignore all Windows notifications about USB cable connection.

data.name: FlashingMessageChangeToFlashMode
data.value: Switching the device to flashing mode

data.name: GoToMyPhoneHasNotBeenDetectedIfNotDetected
data.value: If your device is not detected, go to '{0}' page.

data.name: HtcPackageNotFound
data.value: Software package is not found on server

data.name: IfYourPhoneIsWorking
data.value: If your device is working normally, you can install new software.

data.name: KeepButtonTillImage
data.value: Keep the button pressed until you see an image like on the screen.

data.name: KeepButtonsTillImage
data.value: Keep the buttons pressed until you see an image like on the screen.

data.name: LumiaBatteryChecking
data.value: Your device battery is running low. You can continue, but it may damage your device.

data.name: ManualRestartHtcInfo
data.value: Device information could not be read. Please follow steps below to continue or click "{0}" to cancel process.

data.name: ManufacturerDetectionFailed
data.value: Sorry, we could not determine your device's manufacturer.

data.name: ModelIdentificationAcerM220
data.value: In order to ensure the correct software is provided for your device, please open 'Settings > Device Information > Product SKU' and read 'Product SKU' from your phone and verify the specific model you have. Installing the software for a different model may render your device inoperative. Once verified, please choose from one of the choices below.

data.name: ModelIdentificationAcerM330
data.value: In order to ensure the correct software is provided for your device, please open 'Settings > Extra > Extra > Device Info' and read 'Product SKU' from your phone and verify the specific model you have. Installing the software for a different model may render your device inoperative. Once verified, please choose from one of the choices below.

data.name: ModelIdentificationUnderBackCover
data.value: In order to ensure the correct software is provided for your device, please remove the back cover from your phone and verify the specific model you have. Installing the software for a different model may render your device inoperative. Once verified, please choose from one of the choices below.

data.name: ModelIndentificationAlcatelIDO4S
data.value: In oder to ensure the correct software is provided for your device, please open 'Settings > System > About > More Info' and read the value for 'Model:'

data.name: ModelIndentificationHPElite3
data.value: In order to ensure the correct software is provided for your device, please open 'Settings > System > About > More Info'. You will see the Model name under ‘Device Information’. Use this name to select one of the icons below.

data.name: MoreThanOnePackageFound
data.value: Found more than one package - please select one and click "{0}" to continue.

data.name: NoPackagesFoundSelectAnotherDirectory
data.value: Could not find correct package. Please select different directory or select package manually.

data.name: OnePackageFound
data.value: Found one package for: {0}. Please click "{1}" to continue or select different folder or file.

data.name: PackageNotCompatible
data.value: Selected package is not compatible with connected device.

data.name: PackageNotFound
data.value: Package not available for this device.

data.name: PhoneIsUpToDate
data.value: You have the latest available software version.

data.name: PleaseSelectManufacturer
data.value: Please select the correct one below:

data.name: PleaseSelectTheImage
data.value: Please, select the image that presents the state of your device.

data.name: PressAndHoldPowerButton
data.value: While holding the volume up button, press and hold the power button for 10 seconds, until the middle LED on the device arm lights up.

data.name: PressAndHoldVolumeUp
data.value: Press and hold the volume up button.

data.name: PressPowerAndVolumeDown
data.value: Press Power and "Volume down" at the same time.

data.name: PressThePowerButtonUntilSwitchOff
data.value: Press and hold "Power" button until device vibrates.

data.name: PressVolumeUpVolumeDown
data.value: When device vibrates, press "Volume up" and "Volume down" at the same time.

data.name: RebootHtc
data.value: You can now restart your device back to normal mode. To restart the device please press the power button and hold for a while.

data.name: RebootPhoneInstructions
data.value: Device could not be found. Please try to reboot your device by pressing Power and "Volume down" at the same time. Keep the buttons pressed until the device vibrates.

data.name: RecoveryImpossibleFromEmergencyMode
data.value: Unfortunately, if your device is not on the list of downloaded packages, you can not repair your device using WDRT application.

data.name: ReleasePowerPressVolumeUp
data.value: When device vibrates, release the Power button and press "Volume up".

data.name: ResetSettingsQuestion
data.value: Are you sure you want to reset all settings to the default values?

data.name: SelectDeviceToRecover
data.value: Select device you want to recover

data.name: SelectPhoneAndFollowInstructions
data.value: If your device is detected, select it from the list of devices and follow on-screen instructions.

data.name: Survey_Choice_AppsNotWorking1
data.value: My apps are not working as expected

data.name: Survey_Choice_DeviceNotWorking1
data.value: My device is not working as expected

data.name: Survey_Choice_InsiderProgram_AnswerContent
data.value: I am in the insider program

data.name: Survey_Choice_PrevVersionMoreReliable1
data.value: The previous version seemed more reliable

data.name: Survey_Header1
data.value: Why are you recovering your device?

data.name: ThereIsMandatoryApplicationUpdate
data.value: There is a mandatory application update {0}.

data.name: ThisUpdateMustBeInstalled
data.value: This {0} update must be installed and cannot be skipped. The application can not be used until it is updated. Before installing this update please unplug all devices.

data.name: TrySoftResetInEmergencyMode
data.value: Try 'soft reset': press Power button and Volume down button simultaneously and hold for about 10 seconds. When the device is in this mode, it will not vibrate, but it will be restarted. If resetting didn't help, you will need to perform recovery procedure.

data.name: TrySoftResetInFlashMode
data.value: Try restarting the device using 'soft reset': press Power button and Volume down button simultaneously and hold for about 10 seconds. The device should vibrate after a while, signalizing that it will restart. If restarting didn't bring you into normal mode, you will need to install new software on the device.

data.name: TurnOffYourHoloLens
data.value: Turn off your HoloLens by pressing the power button for 15 seconds, until all of the lights are off.

data.name: UpdateAvailable
data.value: There is an update for your device
